content.text: Nice to meet you, [User 1's name]. I'm [User 2's name].
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, play video games, and go out with friends.
Me too! I love reading, especially science fiction and fantasy. I also love playing video games, but I'm not very good at them.
That's cool! I love reading too. I'm more of a historical fiction and romance reader, but I do like a good science fiction book every now and then. What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is Anne of Green Gables. I love the story of a young girl who finds a home with a loving family. It's a timeless classic.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out. What's your favorite video game?
My favorite video game is The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time. It's a classic for a reason. It's just so much fun to play.
I've never played that game, but I've heard good things about it too. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Well, it's nice meeting you, [User 1's name]. I hope we can get to know each other better.
It's nice meeting you too, [User 2's name]. I hope so too.
